feed.title: CDC Emergency Preparedness and You
feed.description: These CDC podcasts are intended to increase the nation's ability to prepare for and respond to public health emergencies.

entries.title: Back-to-School Preparedness
entries.contentSnippet: CDC provides direction, support, and coordination to help the public be prepared. This podcast discusses how parents and ...
entries.content: CDC provides direction, support, and coordination to help the public be prepared. This podcast discusses how parents and students can be prepared at school.

entries.title: Snowpocalypse
entries.contentSnippet: In this podcast, CDC asks its staff about their experiences during the January 2014 Snowpocalypse and if they were prepared.
entries.content: In this podcast, CDC asks its staff about their experiences during the January 2014 Snowpocalypse and if they were prepared.

entries.title: Boots on the Ground: Maricopa County
entries.contentSnippet: In this podcast, we talk to CDC career epidemiology field officer Rebecca Sunenshine about her response efforts to a suspected ...
entries.content: In this podcast, we talk to CDC career epidemiology field officer Rebecca Sunenshine about her response efforts to a suspected tuberculosis case aboard a US Airways flight and the development of an airport emergency response plan.
